DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy carboxymethylcellulose base eye drop formulation compare carboxymethylcellulose base preservative-free lubricant eye drop ( OPTIVE™ ) subject dry eye disease .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Safety Efficacy A New Eye Drop Formulation With OPTIVE™ Subjects With Dry Eye Disease
DOC.criteria: Have use artificial tear dry eye Start date counter , herbal , prescription nutritional supplement may affect dry eye vision within 3 month prior study start anticipate change dosage study History eye surgery trauma 6 month prior study start Current use use within 2 week study start , topical eye medication .
